title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Skills: Strategic Pricing Decisions and Value Creation Through Experiential Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic economics and marketing concepts comprehension
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can create value chain maps based on real cases and analyze strategic pricing factors through them
Learners can explain the impact of loss aversion psychology and cultural elements on premium pricing strategies via scenario simulations
Learners can propose value creation methods in specific markets using provided tools (Vertical Value Stick diagrams)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
